## Iana.LanguageRegistries.loadFromZip() method

Loads language registries from a compressed ZIP file.

**Signature:**

```typescript
static loadFromZip(zipPath: string): Result<LanguageRegistries>;
```

Result&lt;[LanguageRegistries](./ts-bcp47.iana.languageregistries.md)<!-- -->&gt;
